public class Movie
extends java.lang.Object

getSource

public int getSource()
Return actual source value from the Movie Object xmlfile

Returns:
Returns numeric value for the source setting in the libary xmlfile Value: 1 - Sage Recording Value: 2 - Imported Video

getSeries

public int getSeries()
Return actual series value from the Movie Object xmlfile

Returns:
